title: Admin Dashboard Metrics Display
description: Verify that the admin dashboard displays real-time metrics including total members, new members, revenue, and growth indicators accurately.

steps.description: Login as a wine club owner with valid credentials.
Navigate to the Admin Dashboard.
Verify total members count is displayed and matches the backend data.
Verify new members count is shown for the selected period.
Verify revenue metrics reflect recent transactions.
Check that growth indicators are computed and displayed correctly.

title: Member Management and Square Customer Sync
description: Verify member lifecycle management including adding, updating members and syncing with Square customers.

steps.description: Login as wine club owner.
Navigate to Member Management.
Add a new member with valid details.
Verify member is saved and visible in the list.
Edit the member's information.
Confirm the edited data is correctly updated.
Trigger manual sync with Square.
Ensure the member data is correctly reflected in the Square customers system.
Assign the member to a subscription plan.
Verify the plan assignment is saved and reflected in Square customer groups.

title: Subscription Plan Creation and Square Customer Group Integration
description: Validate creation of subscription plans and automatic creation of corresponding Square customer groups.

steps.description: Login as wine club owner.
Navigate to Plan Management.
Create a new subscription plan with valid parameters.
Verify new plan is listed in Plan Management.
Check that a Square customer group corresponding to the plan is automatically created.
Validate that the Square API call was successful and data is consistent.

title: Club Setup Wizard Functionality and Persistence
description: Verify multi-step club setup wizard saves Square credentials, preference settings, inventory, and shipping configurations without loss on refresh.

steps.description: Login as wine club owner.
Open Club Setup Wizard.
Input valid Square API credentials and proceed.
Configure wine inventory and advance.
Set up shipping zones and save.
Refresh the wizard page.
Verify all entered data including credentials, inventory, and shipping zones are persisted after refresh.

title: Customer Preferences and Custom Shipment Builder
description: Test creating global preferences and assigning custom shipments with specific wines to members properly.

steps.description: Login as wine club owner.
Navigate to Customer Preferences section.
Create global wine category preferences.
Verify global preferences are saved and visible.
Use the custom shipment builder to assign specific wines to a member.
Confirm the assigned wines are correctly linked to the member's shipment.

title: Fulfillment Workflow End-to-End
description: Validate the complete fulfillment workflow from Square order processing to shipping, including CSV export and tracking number uploads.

steps.description: Login as wine club owner.
Access Fulfillment Workflow section.
Retrieve and process incoming Square orders.
Verify orders are correctly displayed and processed stepwise.
Export fulfillment data as CSV.
Check the exported CSV file format and contents for correctness.
Upload shipment tracking numbers against processed orders.
Confirm tracking numbers are saved and visible to customers.

title: Embeddable Signup Widget Display and Functionality
description: Ensure the embeddable signup widget displays only real subscription plans with wine previews and allows successful membership signup.

steps.description: Embed the signup widget into a Square website.
Verify the widget displays only valid subscription plans from backend with no fallback or dummy data.
Confirm wine previews correspond to the plans shown.
Submit a signup form selecting a plan with valid customer data.
Check successful signup and confirmation flow.

title: SaaS Admin Portal Multi-Club Management
description: Verify SaaS administrators can manage multiple wine clubs and admin users with correct access controls.

steps.description: Login as SaaS platform administrator.
Navigate to SaaS Admin Portal dashboard.
Confirm list of all wine clubs managed is displayed.
Select a wine club and view its details.
Manage admin users by adding, editing, or removing.
Verify admin user access permissions are updated accordingly.

title: User Authentication and Multi-Tenancy Data Isolation
description: Test secure authentication flows along with role-based portal redirection and strict multi-tenant data isolation enforcing row-level security.

steps.description: Attempt login with valid wine club owner credentials using magic link.
Verify successful login and redirection to appropriate wine club owner portal.
Login as a wine club member and access customer portal.
Ensure member data is limited to own membership and club.
Login as SaaS platform administrator.
Confirm access to all club data with proper admin controls.
Attempt to query data of other wine clubs directly via backend.
Validate row-level security denies access to unauthorized data.

title: Error Handling on Invalid Square API Credentials
description: Verify that invalid Square API credentials entered during Club Setup Wizard produce proper error messages and prevent progression until corrected.

steps.description: Navigate to Club Setup Wizard.
Enter invalid Square API credentials.
Attempt to save and proceed to next step.
Verify appropriate error message is shown about invalid credentials.
Confirm progression to next step is blocked.

title: Graceful Handling of Square API Failures
description: Test application behavior when Square API is unreachable or returns errors during customer, payment, or inventory interactions.

steps.description: Simulate Square API downtime or return error responses during member sync.
Perform member sync action.
Verify user receives clear error notification about API failure.
Application recovers gracefully without crashing or data corruption.

title: UI Validation for Required Fields and Input Formats
description: Verify UI validations across forms for required fields, email formats, and invalid inputs in membership, plan creation, and signup widget.

steps.description: Open Member Management add/edit form.
Attempt to submit form leaving required fields empty or entering invalid emails.
Verify that appropriate validation messages are displayed and submission is blocked.
Repeat similar validation checks on Plan Management forms and Signup Widget.
Confirm consistent validation behavior across forms.

title: Real-Time Data Updates on Dashboard
description: Verify that the Admin Dashboard reflects real-time updates when data such as new members or revenue changes occur.

steps.description: Login and open Admin Dashboard.
Simulate a new member signup or payment through backend or API.
Verify the dashboard metrics update in real-time without manual page refresh.
